    • Method Detail

      • buildSVGDialog

        public static ProgressDialog buildSVGDialog(Context context,
                                            boolean cancelable,
                                            java.lang.Integer imageSizeX,
                                            java.lang.Integer imageSizeY,
                                            java.lang.String[] svgArray,
                                            int[] svgColors,
                                            int[] svgTraceColors)
        Builder for the Custom Progress bar
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        cancelable - Is cancellable progress bar or not
        imageSizeX - Size of the SVG Image (x - width)
        imageSizeY - Size of the SVG Image (y - height)
        svgArray - The array of SVG Strings. If null, it will default to the spinning circle
        svgColors - The array of svg colors. SIZE MUST MATCH THE SIZE OF THE ARRAY OF SVG STRINGS!
        svgTraceColors - The array of svg tracing colors. SIZE MUST MATCH THE SIZE OF THE ARRAY OF SVG STRINGS!
        Returns:
        ProgressDialog todo come back and refactor this in
